description: This file defines an application theme for a Flutter app, including color schemes, theme data for light mode, and some custom styling elements like gradient.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing theme configurations, color constants, and styling for a Flutter app.

methods.name: AppTheme.light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the Ocean Professional color scheme and material3 styling.

methods.name: AppTheme.softGradient
methods.description: A LinearGradient object providing a soft, subtle color gradient for UI elements.
